title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.76 - Dispensing; prohibition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.76 - Dispensing; prohibition

State Regulations

Controlled substances shall not be prescribed for, administered or dispensed to addicts or habitual users of controlled substances except as provided by the Public Health Law or this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
80.76

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
